settings.main_header: Scrubs you can wear and wear

settings.title: From the Front Lines, For the Front Lines
settings.text:
At Dr. Woof Apparel, we're more than just another uniform brand—we're clinicians who share your commitment to patient care.

Founded by a family of three veterinarians, two of whom are still actively working full-time, we stay on top of every challenge you face in the real world. Because we're in the trenches too, we obsess over every design detail—continually refining based on your feedback and cutting no corners.

The result? Medical apparel that stands up to the longest shifts, created by professionals who truly understand what you need—every single day.

settings.title: Celebrate Healthcare Heroes Now with Dr. Woof Apparel
settings.text:
At Dr. Woof Apparel, we're celebrating the unsung champions of healthcare. Nominate a healthcare hero who inspires you and help us honor their dedication with the chance to win a $3000 Healthcare Hero Award.

Share their story and join our community of over 40,000 in recognizing the compassion and commitment that make a difference every day!

settings.custom_html:
Shhh…. 7 Dr Woof shopping hacks to help you buy scrubs online like a pro

1. Save BIG with Dr Woof deals

Never wear boxy, poorly-fitting scrubs again. Get an epic discount on high-quality scrubs designed in Australia using our:

  • Bundle & Save Scrubs Deals: Get your whole work wardrobe in one swoop.
  • Bundle & Save Scrub Cap Deals: Mix and match over 40 cute scrub cap designs.
  • Bundle & Save Compression Socks Deals: Goodbye, foot fatigue. Hello, blood-flow boosting support.

2. Buy scrubs online for less with a Dr Woof discount code

Not the right time for a bundle deal? Save on smaller orders using a Dr. Woof discount code.

Join our mailing list for the latest discount codes – including 10% off your first order.

JOIN OUR MAILING LIST

3. Grab $20 off by referring a friend

Sign up for our referral program and share your Dr Woof referral link with your friends.

For every friend that orders using your link, we'll give you $20 off an order over $80. T&Cs apply.

REFER A FRIEND

4. Shop your favourite colours before they sell out

At Dr. Woof, most of the products we release are limited edition. #keepingitfresh

If you spot a scrub colour or patterned scrub top that makes your heart skip a beat … snap it up quickly in case it goes away for good.

Browse our collections today:

  • Blue scrub uniforms
  • Green scrub uniforms
  • Black scrub uniforms
  • Pink scrub uniforms
  • Purple scrub uniforms
  • Gray scrub uniforms
  • Orange scrub uniforms
  • Printed scrub tops

5. Vote on new designs in the Dr Woof Insiders Club

Is there a scrub colour we're missing? A feature you wish we'd include? A hat, sock or scrub top print you're dying to see?

Make it happen.

Join the Dr Woof Insiders Club to share product ideas and vote on which colour we launch next.

BECOME AN INSIDER

6. The ultimate hack: Get your work to buy your Dr Woof scrubs for you

Does your work uniform need an upgrade?

Share this link with your practice manager.

https://www.drwoofapparel.com/pages/teams

We can help you:

  • Make your workplace look more polished and professional
  • Keep your staff happy and comfortable
  • Choose the perfect new uniform
  • Find a great price using bulk discounts
